description.value: Maps RolSnomedCodelijst codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactPerson-v4.1 (2024))](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactPerson-v4.1(2024EN))) to RolCodelijst codes in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactPerson-v3.4 ((2020))](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactPerson-v3.4(2020EN)))
